import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { ShoppingBag, Mail, Phone, MapPin } from "lucide-react"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; export const Footer = () => { const { t } = useTranslation("common"); return (
{/* Company Info */}
{t("app.name")}

{t("app.tagline")}

Facebook Twitter LinkedIn
{/* Quick Links */}

{t("footer.quickLinks")}

  • {t("footer.browseProducts")}
  • {t("footer.aboutUs")}
  • {t("footer.helpCenter")}
  • {t("footer.contactUs")}
  • {t("footer.privacyPolicy")}
  • {t("footer.terms")}
{/* Contact Info */}

{t("footer.contactInfo")}

{t("footer.email")}
{t("footer.phone")}
{t("footer.address")}

{t("footer.copyright")}

{t("footer.security")} {t("footer.disputeResolution")} {t("footer.howEscrowWorks")}
); };
